text: so most most times once we move to the
kitchen after introducing the
ingredients we would switch to a mix of
Italian and English uh but for about
three or four classes I decided to just
uh speak Italian for the whole class and
the first time we tried it everybody was
silent and they they were a bit under
shock um but then they started to
communicate because they needed to tell
each other please pass me the knife
or I need more flower so um I decided
not to do a full full full immersion
because we were meeting only once per
week and I don't think that it would
have been as effective as um making a
mix of Italian and English I think that
the students still needed to have the
safety net of their own language and and
then it was fun from time to time to
just try full immersion
